[!code-vb[VbRefFile#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbRefFile/VB/Class1.vb#3)] 此示例合并了两个路径，以创建格式正确的路径。This example combines two paths to create a properly formatted path. [!code-vb[VbRefFile#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbRefFile/VB/Class1.vb#4)] 此示例将返回 `C:\Dir1\Dir2\Dir4\Dir5\File.txt`。This example returns `C:\Dir1\Dir2\Dir4\Dir5\File.txt`.

summary.span: 将目录内容复制到其他目录。

span.span: Copies the contents of a directory to another directory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将源目录的内容复制到目标目录。This method copies the contents of the source directory to the target directory. 如果目标目录不存在，则创建它。If the target directory does not exist, it is created. 如果目标位置中存在具有相同名称的目录，则将合并这两个目录的内容。If a directory with the same name exists in the target location, the contents of the two directories are merged. 操作期间可为此目录指定新名称。You can specify a new name for the directory during the operation. 在目录中复制文件时，可能会引发由特定文件导致的异常。When copying files within a directory, exceptions may be thrown that are caused by a specific file. 如果引发此类异常，则会将它们合并为一个异常，该异常的 `Data` 属性以文件或目录路径为密钥，特定异常消息包含在对应值中的 。When such exceptions are thrown, they are consolidated into a single exception whose `Data` property holds entries in the form of an in which the file or directory path is the key and the specific exception message is contained in the corresponding value. 使用 `For…Each` 来枚举条目。Use `For…Each` to enumerate through the entries. 下表列出了涉及 `My.Computer.FileSystem.CopyDirectory` 方法的任务的示例。The following table lists an example of a task involving the `My.Computer.FileSystem.CopyDirectory` method. |至To|请参阅See| |-|-| |复制目录Copy a directory|[如何：在 Visual Basic 中将目录复制到另一个目录How to: Copy a Directory to Another Directory in Visual Basic](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-copy-a-directory-to-another-directory.md)| ## Examples 下面的示例将目录 `TestDirectory1` 的内容复制到 `TestDirectory2`中。The following example copies the contents of directory `TestDirectory1` into `TestDirectory2`. [!code-vb[VbVbcnMyFileSystem#49](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbcnMyFileSystem/VB/Class1.vb#94)] 将 `C:\TestDirectory1` 和 `C:\TestDirectory2` 替换为要复制的目录的路径和名称以及要将该目录复制到的位置。Replace `C:\TestDirectory1` and `C:\TestDirectory2` with the path and name of the directory you wish to copy and the location to which you wish to copy it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将源目录的内容复制到目标目录。This method copies the contents of the source directory to the target directory. 如果目标目录不存在，则创建它。If the target directory does not exist, it is created. 如果目标位置中存在具有相同名称的目录，则将合并这两个目录的内容。If a directory with the same name exists in the target location, the contents of the two directories are merged. 操作期间可为此目录指定新名称。You can specify a new name for the directory during the operation. 在目录中复制文件时，可能会引发由特定文件导致的异常。When copying files within a directory, exceptions may be thrown that are caused by a specific file. 如果引发此类异常，则会将它们合并为一个异常，该异常的 `Data` 属性以文件或目录路径为密钥，特定异常消息包含在对应值中的 。When such exceptions are thrown, they are consolidated into a single exception whose `Data` property holds entries in the form of an in which the file or directory path is the key and the specific exception message is contained in the corresponding value. 使用 `For…Each` 来枚举条目。Use `For…Each` to enumerate through the entries. 下表列出了涉及 `My.Computer.FileSystem.CopyDirectory` 方法的任务的示例。The following table lists an example of a task involving the `My.Computer.FileSystem.CopyDirectory` method. |至To|请参阅See| |-|-| |复制目录Copy a directory|[如何：在 Visual Basic 中将目录复制到另一个目录How to: Copy a Directory to Another Directory in Visual Basic](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-copy-a-directory-to-another-directory.md)| ## Examples 下面的示例将目录 `TestDirectory1` 的内容复制到 `TestDirectory2`，并显示进度对话框和任何错误对话框。The following example copies the contents of directory `TestDirectory1` into `TestDirectory2`, showing progress dialog and any error dialog. [!code-vb[VbVbcnMyFileSystem#49](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbcnMyFileSystem/VB/Class1.vb#92)] 将 `C:\TestDirectory1` 和 `C:\TestDirectory2` 替换为要复制的目录的路径和名称以及要将该目录复制到的位置。Replace `C:\TestDirectory1` and `C:\TestDirectory2` with the path and name of the directory you wish to copy and the location to which you wish to copy it.

summary.span: 将目录内容复制到其他目录。

span.span: Copies the contents of a directory to another directory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将源目录的内容复制到目标目录。This method copies the contents of the source directory to the target directory. 如果目标目录不存在，则创建它。If the target directory does not exist, it is created. 如果目标位置中存在具有相同名称的目录，则将合并这两个目录的内容。If a directory with the same name exists in the target location, the contents of the two directories are merged. 操作期间可为此目录指定新名称。You can specify a new name for the directory during the operation. 在目录中复制文件时，可能会引发由特定文件导致的异常。When copying files within a directory, exceptions may be thrown that are caused by a specific file. 如果引发此类异常，则会将它们合并为一个异常，该异常的 `Data` 属性以文件或目录路径为密钥，特定异常消息包含在对应值中的 。When such exceptions are thrown, they are consolidated into a single exception whose `Data` property holds entries in the form of an in which the file or directory path is the key and the specific exception message is contained in the corresponding value. 使用 `For…Each` 来枚举条目。Use `For…Each` to enumerate through the entries. 下表列出了涉及 `My.Computer.FileSystem.CopyDirectory` 方法的任务的示例。The following table lists an example of a task involving the `My.Computer.FileSystem.CopyDirectory` method. |至To|请参阅See| |-|-| |复制目录Copy a directory|[如何：在 Visual Basic 中将目录复制到另一个目录How to: Copy a Directory to Another Directory in Visual Basic](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-copy-a-directory-to-another-directory.md)| ## Examples 下面的示例将目录 `TestDirectory1` 的内容复制到 `TestDirectory2`，显示进度对话框和任何错误对话框，如果用户在操作过程中单击 "**取消**"，则不执行任何操作。The following example copies the contents of directory `TestDirectory1` into `TestDirectory2`, showing progress dialog and any error dialog, and does nothing if the user clicks **Cancel** during the operation. [!code-vb[VbVbcnMyFileSystem#49](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbcnMyFileSystem/VB/Class1.vb#93)] 将 `C:\TestDirectory1` 和 `C:\TestDirectory2` 替换为要复制的目录的路径和名称以及要将该目录复制到的位置。Replace `C:\TestDirectory1` and `C:\TestDirectory2` with the path and name of the directory you wish to copy and the location to which you wish to copy it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `CopyFile` 不会保留 Ace （访问控制项）。`CopyFile` does not preserve ACEs (Access Control Entries). 新创建的文件从创建它的目录继承默认的 Ace。The newly created file inherits default ACEs from the directory in which it is created. 下表列出了涉及 `My.Computer.FileSystem.CopyFile` 方法的任务示例。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `My.Computer.FileSystem.CopyFile` method. |至To|请参阅See| |-|-| |将文件复制到相同的目录。Copy a file to the same directory.|[如何：在 Visual Basic 中的同一目录中创建文件的副本How to: Create a Copy of a File in the Same Directory in Visual Basic](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-create-a-copy-of-a-file-in-the-same-directory.md)| |将文件复制到其他目录。Copy a file to a different directory.|[如何：在 Visual Basic 中的其他目录中创建文件的副本How to: Create a Copy of a File in a Different Directory in Visual Basic](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-create-a-copy-of-a-file-in-a-different-directory.md)| ## Examples 此示例将文件 `Test.txt` 复制到目录 `TestFiles2` 而不覆盖现有文件。This example copies the file `Test.txt` to the directory `TestFiles2` without overwriting existing files. [!code-vb[VbRefFile#15](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbRefFile/VB/Class1.vb#15)] 将文件路径替换为要在代码中使用的路径。Replace the file paths with the paths you want to use in your code. 此示例将文件 `Test.txt` 复制到目录 `TestFiles2` 并将其重命名 `NewFile.txt`。This example copies the file `Test.txt` to the directory `TestFiles2` and renames it `NewFile.txt`. [!code-vb[VbRefFile#16](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbRefFile/VB/Class1.vb#16)] 将文件路径替换为要在代码中使用的路径。Replace the file paths with the paths you want to use in your code.

remarks.format: ## Examples 仅当目录为空时，此示例才会删除目录 `OldDirectory`。The example deletes the directory `OldDirectory` only if it is empty. [!code-vb[VbVbcnMyFileSystem#56](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbcnMyFileSystem/VB/Class1.vb#56)] 此示例将删除目录 `OldDirectory` 及其所有内容。This example deletes the directory `OldDirectory` and all of its contents. [!code-vb[VbVbcnMyFileSystem#57](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbcnMyFileSystem/VB/Class1.vb#57)] 此示例将删除目录 `OldDirectory` 及其所有内容，要求用户确认删除，但不会将内容发送到**回收站**。This example deletes the directory `OldDirectory` and all of its contents, asking the user to confirm the deletion, but does not send the contents to the **Recycle Bin**. [!code-vb[VbVbcnMyFileSystem#58](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbcnMyFileSystem/VB/Class1.vb#58)] 此示例将删除目录 `OldDirectory` 及其所有内容，并将其发送到**回收站**，但不会显示操作的进度。This example deletes the directory `OldDirectory` and all of its contents, sending them to the **Recycle Bin**, but does not show the progress of the operation. [!code-vb[VbVbcnMyFileSystem#59](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbcnMyFileSystem/VB/Class1.vb#59)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用 `wildcards` 参数来指定特定模式。You can use the `wildcards` parameter to specify a specific pattern. 如果要在搜索中包含子目录的内容，请将 `searchType` 参数设置为 `SearchAllSubDirectories`。If you would like to include the contents of subdirectories in the search, set the `searchType` parameter to `SearchAllSubDirectories`. 如果没有找到与指定模式匹配的目录，则返回一个空集合。An empty collection is returned if no directories matching the specified pattern are found. 下表列出了涉及 `My.Computer.FileSystem.GetDirectories` 方法的任务的示例。The following table lists an example of a task involving the `My.Computer.FileSystem.GetDirectories` method. |至To|请参阅See| |-|-| |列出具有特定模式的子目录List subdirectories with a specific pattern|[如何：在 Visual Basic 中查找具有特定模式的子目录How to: Find Subdirectories with a Specific Pattern in Visual Basic](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-find-subdirectories-with-a-specific-pattern.md)| ## Examples 下面的示例返回目录结构中的所有目录，其中包含名称中的单词 `Logs`，并将它们添加到 `ListBox1`中。The following example returns all the directories in the directory structure that contain the word `Logs` in their names and adds them to `ListBox1`. summary.span: 将文件移动到一个新位置。

span.span: Moves a file to a new location.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果目标结构不存在，则创建它。If the target structure does not exist, it is created. 仅当在同一卷内移动文件时，`MoveFile` 方法才保留 Ace （访问控制项）。The `MoveFile` method preserves ACEs (Access Control Entries) only when moving the file within the same volume. 这包括继承的 Ace，这会在移动时成为直接的 Ace （直接 Ace 优先于继承的 Ace）。This includes inherited ACEs, which become direct ACEs when moved (direct ACEs take precedence over inherited ACEs). 如果在卷之间移动文件，则不会复制 Ace。If a file is moved between volumes, ACEs will not be copied. 下表列出了涉及 `My.Computer.FileSystem.MoveFile` 方法的任务的示例。The following table lists an example of a task involving the `My.Computer.FileSystem.MoveFile` method. |至To|请参阅See| |-|-| |移动文件Move a file|[如何：在 Visual Basic 中移动文件How to: Move a File in Visual Basic](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-move-a-file.md)| ## Examples 此示例将文件 `Test.txt` 从 `TestDir1` 移到 `TestDir2`。This example moves the file `Test.txt` from `TestDir1` to `TestDir2`. [!code-vb[VbVbcnMyFileSystem#86](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbcnMyFileSystem/VB/Class1.vb#86)] 此示例将文件 `Test.txt` 从 `TestDir1` 移到 `TestDir2`，并将其重命名 `Test2.txt`。This example moves the file `Test.txt` from `TestDir1` to `TestDir2` and renames it `Test2.txt`. [!code-vb[VbVbcnMyFileSystem#87](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbcnMyFileSystem/VB/Class1.vb#87)]

summary.span: 将文件移动到一个新位置。

span.span: Moves a file to a new location.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果目标结构不存在，则创建它。If the target structure does not exist, it is created. 仅当在同一卷内移动文件时，`MoveFile` 方法才保留 Ace （访问控制项）。The `MoveFile` method preserves ACEs (Access Control Entries) only when moving the file within the same volume. 这包括继承的 Ace，这会在移动时成为直接的 Ace （直接 Ace 优先于继承的 Ace）。This includes inherited ACEs, which become direct ACEs when moved (direct ACEs take precedence over inherited ACEs). 如果在卷之间移动文件，则不会复制 Ace。If a file is moved between volumes, ACEs will not be copied. 下表列出了涉及 `My.Computer.FileSystem.MoveFile` 方法的任务的示例。The following table lists an example of a task involving the `My.Computer.FileSystem.MoveFile` method. |至To|请参阅See| |-|-| |移动文件Move a file|[如何：在 Visual Basic 中移动文件How to: Move a File in Visual Basic](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-move-a-file.md)| ## Examples 此示例将文件 `Test.txt` 从 `TestDir1` 移到 `TestDir2`。This example moves the file `Test.txt` from `TestDir1` to `TestDir2`. [!code-vb[VbVbcnMyFileSystem#86](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbcnMyFileSystem/VB/Class1.vb#86)] 此示例将文件 `Test.txt` 从 `TestDir1` 移到 `TestDir2`，并将其重命名 `Test2.txt`。This example moves the file `Test.txt` from `TestDir1` to `TestDir2` and renames it `Test2.txt`. [!code-vb[VbVbcnMyFileSystem#87](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbcnMyFileSystem/VB/Class1.vb#87)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `OpenTextFileWriter` 方法打开并初始化文件的流，然后返回该流的 对象。The `OpenTextFileWriter` method opens and initializes a stream for a file and then returns the object for that stream. 您可以根据需要多次写入流，然后在完成时将其关闭。You can write to the steam as many times as necessary and then close it when you are finished. > [!NOTE] > 必须对 对象调用 方法，以确保所有数据都正确写入基础流。You must call the method on the object to make sure that all data is correctly written to the underlying stream. 如果只是将几个字符串写入文件，则使用 方法可能会更简单。If you are writing only a few strings to a file, it might be simpler to use the method. 下表列出了涉及 `My.Computer.FileSystem.OpenTextFileWriter` 方法的任务的示例。The following table lists an example of a task involving the `My.Computer.FileSystem.OpenTextFileWriter` method. |至To|请参阅See| |-|-| |使用 `StreamWriter` 将文本写入文件Write text to a file with a `StreamWriter`|[如何：在 Visual Basic 中使用 StreamWriter 向文件中写入文本How to: Write Text to Files with a StreamWriter in Visual Basic](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-write-text-to-files-with-a-streamwriter.md)| ## Examples 此示例使用 `My.Computer.FileSystem.OpenTextFileWriter` 方法打开 ，并使用它通过 `StreamWriter` 类的 `WriteLine` 方法，将字符串写入文本文件。This example opens a with the `My.Computer.FileSystem.OpenTextFileWriter` method and uses it to write a string to a text file with the `WriteLine` method of the `StreamWriter` class. [!code-vb[VbRefFile#14](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbRefFile/VB/Class1.vb#14)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `OpenTextFileWriter` 方法打开并初始化文件的流，然后返回该流的 对象。The `OpenTextFileWriter` method opens and initializes a stream for a file and then returns the object for that stream. 您可以根据需要多次写入流，然后在完成时将其关闭。You can write to the steam as many times as necessary and then close it when you are finished. > [!NOTE] > 必须对 对象调用 方法，以确保所有数据都正确写入基础流。You must call the method on the object to make sure that all data is correctly written to the underlying stream. 如果只是将几个字符串写入文件，则使用 方法可能会更简单。If you are writing only a few strings to a file, it might be simpler to use the method. 下表列出了涉及 `My.Computer.FileSystem.OpenTextFileWriter` 方法的任务的示例。The following table lists an example of a task involving the `My.Computer.FileSystem.OpenTextFileWriter` method. |至To|请参阅See| |-|-| |使用 `StreamWriter` 将文本写入文件Write text to a file with a `StreamWriter`|[如何：在 Visual Basic 中使用 StreamWriter 向文件中写入文本How to: Write Text to Files with a StreamWriter in Visual Basic](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-write-text-to-files-with-a-streamwriter.md)| ## Examples 此示例使用带有 `Unicode` 编码的 `My.Computer.FileSystem.OpenTextFileWriter` 方法打开 ，并使用该方法通过 `StreamWriter` 类的 `WriteLine` 方法，将字符串写入文本文件。This example opens a with the `My.Computer.FileSystem.OpenTextFileWriter` method with `Unicode` encoding and uses it to write a string to a text file with the `WriteLine` method of the `StreamWriter` class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 `My.Computer.FileSystem` 对象的 `ReadAllBytes` 方法，您可以从二进制文件中读取。The `ReadAllBytes` method of the `My.Computer.FileSystem` object allows you to read from a binary file. 文件的内容作为字节数组返回。The contents of the file are returned as a byte array. 不要根据文件的名称来判断文件的内容。Do not make decisions about the contents of the file based on the name of the file. 例如，文件 Form1.vb 可能不是 Visual Basic 源文件。For example, the file Form1.vb may not be a Visual Basic source file. 在应用程序中使用输入的数据之前，需验证所有的输入内容。Verify all inputs before using the data in your application. 下表列出了涉及 `My.Computer.FileSystem.ReadAllBytes` 方法的任务的示例。The following table lists an example of a task involving the `My.Computer.FileSystem.ReadAllBytes` method. |至To|请参阅See| |-|-| |从二进制文件读取Read from a binary file|[如何：读取 Visual Basic 中的二进制文件How to: Read From Binary Files in Visual Basic](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-read-from-binary-files.md)| ## Examples 此示例从文件读取 `C:/Documents and Settings/selfportrait.jpg.`This example reads from the file `C:/Documents and Settings/selfportrait.jpg.` [!code-vb[VbVbcnMyFileSystem#33](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbcnMyFileSystem/VB/Class1.vb#33)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过 `ReadAllText` 对象的 `My.Computer.FileSystem` 方法，可以读取文本文件。The `ReadAllText` method of the `My.Computer.FileSystem` object allows you to read from a text file. 文件的内容作为字符串返回。The contents of the file are returned as a string. 如果文件内容的编码格式为 ASCII 或 utf-8，则可以指定文件编码。The file encoding can be specified if the contents of the file are in an encoding such as ASCII or UTF-8. 如果要从文件中读取包含扩展字符的文件，则需要使用 方法的另一个重载来指定文件编码。If you are reading from a file with extended characters, you need to specify the file encoding using another overload of the method. 不要根据文件的名称来判断文件的内容。Do not make decisions about the contents of the file based on the name of the file. 例如，文件 Form1.vb 可能不是 Visual Basic 源文件。For example, the file Form1.vb may not be a Visual Basic source file. 在应用程序中使用输入的数据之前，需验证所有的输入内容。Verify all inputs before using the data in your application. 下表列出了涉及 `My.Computer.FileSystem.ReadAllText` 方法的任务的示例。The following table lists an example of a task involving the `My.Computer.FileSystem.ReadAllText` method. |至To|请参阅See| |-|-| |从文本文件读取Read from a text file|[如何：读取 Visual Basic 中的文本文件How to: Read From Text Files in Visual Basic](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-read-from-text-files.md)| ## Examples 此示例将 `Test.txt` 的内容读入字符串中，然后将其显示在消息框中。This example reads the contents of `Test.txt` into a string and then displays it in a message box. [!code-vb[VbRefFile#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbRefFile/VB/Class1.vb#8)] 此示例将 ASCII 文件 `Test.txt` 的内容读入字符串中，然后将其显示在消息框中。This example reads the contents of the ASCII file `Test.txt` into a string and then displays it in a message box. [!code-vb[VbRefFile#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbRefFile/VB/Class1.vb#9)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不能用于移动文件；使用 方法可移动并重命名文件。This method cannot be used to move a file; use the method to move and rename the file. 下表列出了涉及 `My.Computer.FileSystem.RenameFile` 方法的任务的示例。The following table lists an example of a task involving the `My.Computer.FileSystem.RenameFile` method. |至To|请参阅See| |-|-| |重命名文件Rename a file|[如何：在 Visual Basic 中重命名文件How to: Rename a File in Visual Basic](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-rename-a-file.md)| ## Examples 此示例将文件 `Test.txt` 重命名为 `SecondTest.txt`。This example renames the file `Test.txt` to `SecondTest.txt`. [!code-vb[VbVbcnMyFileSystem#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbcnMyFileSystem/VB/Class1.vb#1)] 将 "`C:\Test.txt`" 更改为要重命名的文件的路径和文件名。Change "`C:\Test.txt`" to the path and file name of the file that you want to rename.

span.span: Writes data to a binary file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指定的路径（不包括文件名）无效，则会引发 异常。If the specified path, excluding the file name, is not valid, a exception will be thrown. 如果该路径有效，但该文件不存在，则创建该文件。If the path is valid but the file does not exist, the file is created. > [!NOTE] > `WriteAllBytes` 方法会打开一个文件，向其中写入数据，然后将其关闭。The `WriteAllBytes` method opens a file, writes to it, and then closes it. 使用 `WriteAllBytes` 方法的代码比使用 对象的代码更简单。Code that uses the `WriteAllBytes` method is simpler than code that uses a object. 但是，如果使用循环将数据添加到文件，则 对象可以提供更好的性能，因为只需打开并关闭该文件一次。However, if you are adding data to a file using a loop, a object can provide better performance because you only have to open and close the file once. 下表列出了涉及 `My.Computer.FileSystem.WriteAllBytes` 方法的任务的示例。The following table lists an example of a task involving the `My.Computer.FileSystem.WriteAllBytes` method. |至To|请参阅See| |-|-| |写入二进制文件Write to a binary file|[如何：在 Visual Basic 中写入二进制文件How to: Write to Binary Files in Visual Basic](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-write-to-binary-files.md)| ## Examples 此示例将 `CustomerData` 的数据数组追加到文件 `CollectedData`。This example appends the data array `CustomerData` to the file `CollectedData`. [!code-vb[VbVbcnMyFileSystem#50](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbcnMyFileSystem/VB/Class1.vb#50)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks UTF-8 编码用于写入文件。The UTF-8 encoding is used to write to the file. 若要指定不同的编码，请使用 方法的其他重载。To specify a different encoding, use a different overload of the method. 如果指定的文件不存在，则会创建一个。If the specified file does not exist, it is created. 如果指定的编码与文件的现有编码不匹配，则忽略指定的编码。If the specified encoding does not match the existing encoding of the file, the specified coding is ignored. > [!NOTE] > `WriteAllText` 方法会打开一个文件，向其中写入数据，然后将其关闭。The `WriteAllText` method opens a file, writes to it, and then closes it. 使用 `WriteAllText` 方法的代码比使用 对象的代码更简单。Code that uses the `WriteAllText` method is simpler than code that uses a object. 但是，如果要使用循环将字符串添加到文件，则 对象可以提供更好的性能，因为只需打开并关闭该文件一次。However, if you are adding strings to a file by using a loop, a object can provide better performance because you only have to open and close the file one time. 有关更多信息，请参见 方法。For more information, see the method. 下表列出了涉及 `My.Computer.FileSystem.WriteAllText` 方法的任务示例。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `My.Computer.FileSystem.WriteAllText` method. |至To|请参阅See| |-|-| |将文本写入文件Write text to a file|[如何：在 Visual Basic 中将文本写入文件How to: Write Text to Files in Visual Basic](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-write-text-to-files.md)| |向文件中追加文本Append text to a file|[如何：在 Visual Basic 中追加到文本文件How to: Append to Text Files in Visual Basic](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-append-to-text-files.md)| ## Examples 此示例将行 `"This is new text to be added."` 写入文件 `Test.txt`，并覆盖文件中的任何现有文本。This example writes the line `"This is new text to be added."` to the file `Test.txt`, overwriting any existing text in the file. [!code-vb[VbRefFile#21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbRefFile/VB/Class1.vb#21)] 此示例将 `Documents and Settings` 文件夹中的文件名称写入 `FileList.txt`，并在每个文件之间插入一个回车符，以便更好地阅读。This example writes the names of the files in the `Documents and Settings` folder to `FileList.txt`, inserting a carriage return between each for better readability. [!code-vb[VbRefFile#22](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbRefFile/VB/Class1.vb#22)]
